alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 25 at 1:32AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central Montana, including the following counties, in central Montana, Cascade. In north central Montana, Toole. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Additionally, rockslides are possible in steep terrain due to the expected heavy rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
